conbody.p: Meet Photon Core (X-100), the tiny but mighty microcontroller perfect for your next project! Launched May 20, 2024, this easy-to-use device packs a punch with its impressive speed and simple I2C communication, all while running on a standard 3.3V power supply. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a curious beginner, Photon Core opens up a world of possibilities.
